name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious Process Creation Incident
description: A playbook to mitigate a security incident involving the creation of a malicious process used to establish a backdoor for persistent access and exfiltrate sensitive data.

action--dd77c14e-4b40-4a45-8b3e-f5707f8d.name: Terminate malicious process
action--dd77c14e-4b40-4a45-8b3e-f5707f8d.description: Terminate the malicious process that was spawned using elevated privileges.

action--d377e2be-6c59-4acf-9614-d3a2ebe5.name: Investigate network connections
action--d377e2be-6c59-4acf-9614-d3a2ebe5.description: Investigate network connections established to suspicious external IP.

loop--f1c3f7ba-3cb1-4a57-8c22-f3aa0f07b2.name: Perform system scan loop
loop--f1c3f7ba-3cb1-4a57-8c22-f3aa0f07b2.description: Perform a full system scan and repeat until the scan is clean.

action--de31cc97-9e59-41cc-a620-29bf3c87.name: Perform a full system scan
action--de31cc97-9e59-41cc-a620-29bf3c87.description: Executing a full system scan on the affected system to detect and remove any malicious files.

scan_status.description: Indicates whether the last scan was clean.
